website_summaries.verdict: The Nike LunarTempo 2 was able to satisfy many neutral runners, especially those who needed reliable underfoot cushioning for their running sessions. They welcomed its colorful design, its modern look and its responsive components. Though it wasn’t able to please a few testers, many still touted it to be a solid choice for adventures on the pavement.
pros: A lot of runners welcomed the vibrant look of the Nike LunarTempo 2, and they said that it made the façade very appealing
Many reviewers appreciated the look of this shoe, which resembled a knitted material that wrapped around the foot like a cloth
The Flywire cables gained some fans who wanted the upper cover system to feel more snug and secure
Several testers pointed out how comfortable their experience had been with this version
Runners noticed the plush underfoot support given by the Lunarlon foam
This running shoe felt adequately lightweight for many of those who have tried it
There were consumers who were able to wear this shoe for many types of activities, and they reported no problems with it
Some reviewers stated that this shoe was able to last long, that it resisted wear and tear even after many uses
cons: Some runners felt that the mid-sole unit of the LunarTempo 2 was a bit stiff
A tester reported that the threading on the back of the shoe came apart after only one use

customer_reviews.title: Cool but a little too soft in the sole
customer_reviews.text: Love the style but the shoes are very comfortable but are a little soft. I wore the shoes daily for a week and after this period my feet and in particular my heels started to hurt. My podiatrist showed me that the sole was soft which flexed too much as I walked causing my muscles to work overtime. Bottom line - Cool shoes but not for daily use for me.
customer_reviews.author: Skollie14

customer_reviews.title: Sorry to see them discontinued!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Very sorry they are discontinued. I bought 3 pair in different colors since I won’t be able to get them any longer. Most comfortable athletic shoes I have EVER owned. Very light weight and machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: A touch narrow
customer_reviews.text: I got these and would actually say they are a touch narrow for me but if you losen all of the laces you can still make them comfortable just remember they are a running show so probably run a bit narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Schell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes. Lightweight. Great on shins
customer_reviews.text: So, I already had a pair of these shoes and I re-bought the exact same ones. I love them. I get really bad shin splints and I've found when I wear these shoes the shin pain is almost non-existent!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The color is more pink but a very nice summer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Much better bounce than the minimalist light Nike's ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Much better bounce than the minimalist light Nike's I bought last time.
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: Fake nikes
customer_reviews.text: This came in a plastic bag and after running in these shoes for about a week, was fairly certain they were fake
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Lee

customer_reviews.title: He loved them and they fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my dad. He loved them and they fit perfect. The shipping was right on time and I highly recommend ordering shoes here!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Thurn

customer_reviews.title: Best for me
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight. Set aside my asics for these. I have walked 5 miles a day for years. Tried many different shoes. So far these are the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: cmoses128

customer_reviews.title: They love
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is the go to shoe the most for my boys ages 17 and 14. This is 3rd pair. They love them
customer_reviews.author: Katherine S Burch

customer_reviews.title: Its an ace from Nike
customer_reviews.text: An amazingly light pair of shoe. The foot snugs quite comfortably and the moment you walk it is an experience in itself. Would definitely recommend for joggers/walkers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received the shoes, everything exactly right,
customer_reviews.text: Received the shoes, everything exactly right, except that the right shoe has a manufacturers defect where it diagonally to the left foot and cause Pains I hope replaced
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
